entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Forks
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Snow level 900 metres lowering to near valley bottom this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early in the evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
